name: A Ball Slapping Good Time!
description:
A two-player game. Charge your jump, then leap into the air and smack your opponent's small ball with your big ball! What are you waiting for? Grab a friend and play with some balls! :D

Player 1:
A & D: Left & Right
W: Charge jump
Q & E: Tilt top ball left & right

Player 2:
J & L: Left & Right
I: Charge jump
U & O: Tilt top ball left & right

(Tilting only active in certain game modes)

DEV NOTES:

Made for a game jam where the theme was 70s. It was originally about space hoppers, but the concept didn't work and the game became this! It turned out to be pretty fun but, as you can see, did not meet the theme. I'm pretty happy with it, though I think it only needed the first game mode.
